conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D hallmarks present.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of wall thickness, volume, and cutaway perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to floor plan. Minor door swing omissions in some areas but layout is 1:1.

interior_elements.notes: Exceptional furniture mapping, including kitchen island, bathroom fixtures, and bedroom layouts.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render, good lighting, and sharp geometry. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor door/opening orientation simplification in the secondary bathroom area.

summary: A highly accurate and professional-grade 3D conversion that perfectly translates the 2D layout and furniture into a clean isometric model.
